titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Doris Campbell Mallory diary

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Student at the University of Michigan, 1925-1926; graduate of New York State Teachers College at Albany, 1929.
archdesc.scopecontent: Diary (with typescript copy) of her freshman year at the University of Michigan; include detailed occasional descriptions of social activities, her classmates and other friends, and trips taken.
